check.name: AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters
check.description: Restricts using Unicode escapes (such as \u221e). It is possible to allow using escapes for non-printable, control characters. Also, this check can be configured to allow using escapes if trail comment is present. By the option it is possible to allow using escapes if literal contains only them.

property.name: allowByTailComment
property.description: Allow use escapes if trail comment is present.

property.name: allowEscapesForControlCharacters
property.description: Allow use escapes for non-printable, control characters.

property.name: allowIfAllCharactersEscaped
property.description: Allow if all characters in literal are escaped.

property.name: allowNonPrintableEscapes
property.description: Allow use escapes for non-printable, whitespace characters.
